name: Veo3 Fast Enhanced
description: Advanced AI video generation model with exceptional cinematic capabilities, complex scene composition, and professional-grade output. Based on Google's Veo 3 Fast model with incredible functionalities for atmospheric lighting, emotional storytelling, wildlife cinematography, and much more. Excels at creating cinematic masterpieces with detailed shot composition, professional audio design, and sophisticated visual effects.

audioOff.description: $0.25 per second for video without audio

audioOn.description: $0.40 per second for video with synchronized audio

costOptimization: Disable audio for cost savings when audio isn't needed
Use 720p resolution for faster generation and lower costs
Batch process multiple videos with queue system
Enable auto_fix to avoid regeneration costs from policy violations

technicalSpecs.processingMethod: AI-powered video generation with synchronized audio
technicalSpecs.audioSupport: Full synchronized audio generation with dialogue and sound effects
technicalSpecs.promptEnhancement: Built-in prompt enhancement for better results
technicalSpecs.autoFix: Automatic content policy compliance and moderation

examples: Atmospheric lighting scenes with fire and embers
Celestial and mystical compositions with god rays
Ocean wave cinematography with Milky Way backgrounds
Perfume advertisements with water droplet formations
Mystical ritual scenes with fire halos

prompt.description: Detailed text prompt describing the video to generate. Can be simple text or structured JSON format for complex scenes.

enhance_prompt.description: Whether to enhance the prompt for better results

negative_prompt.description: Elements to avoid in the generated video

url.description: URL where the generated video can be downloaded

content_type.description: MIME type of the generated video file

file_name.description: Name of the generated video file

file_size.description: Size of the generated video file in bytes

requestId.description: Unique identifier for the generation request

tips: Use structured JSON format for complex scenes with multiple elements
Include detailed shot composition with camera movements
Specify lighting conditions and atmospheric effects
Define visual beats and timeline progression
Include audio design specifications
Add color palette and grading instructions
Specify physics rules for realistic effects
Include visual rules and constraints
Use professional camera movements (dolly, crane, push-in)
Specify lens types and technical parameters
Include exposure and grading specifications
Define depth of field and focus requirements
Add atmospheric effects and particle systems
Include lighting setup and mood specifications
Specify color grading and post-processing effects
Include ambient sound and environmental audio
Specify sound effects and foley elements
Add musical score and emotional tone
Include dialogue when appropriate
Define audio mixing levels and dynamics
Specify diegetic vs non-diegetic audio elements
Use realistic physics for particle systems
Include volumetric lighting and atmospheric effects
Specify fire, smoke, and ember simulations
Add water and ocean effects with proper physics
Include holographic and sci-fi elements
Use reflection and mirror work for artistic effects
Add astrophotography elements for cosmic scenes

limitations: May require regeneration for optimal results
Complex scenes may need multiple iterations
Audio generation adds to processing time and cost

cinematicFireHalo.description: Cinematic fire halo scene with ethereal witch-priestess

shot.camera_motion: slow vertical dolly-in from low angle (subtle tilt up), no cuts
shot.loop_hint: hold last 6 frames for seamless social autoplay

subject.character: blonde woman in a flowing black long-sleeve dress, barefoot, ethereal witch-priestess
subject.pose: arms raised overhead, palms opening to the sky
subject.wardrobe_motion: dress hem and sleeves ripple upward in heat-draft

scene.environment: void-black backdrop filled with ember particulates
scene.hero_prop: roaring circular fire halo behind subject (solar-flare look)

beats.action: Embers drift up; faint ring of fire traces on behind the subject. Camera begins slow dolly-in from low angle.
beats.focus: silhouette resolves from black; rim-light on hair and arms

beats.action: The fire ring ignites fully and churns like solar plasma; subject raises hands higher, heat ripple intensifies.
beats.focus: glowing edge highlights; micro-sparks arc around palms

beats.action: Subject levitates a few inches; dress billows; ring pulses brighter once, then stabilizes for loop.
beats.focus: hero tableau framed by perfect circle; last frames steady for seamless loop

cinematography.lens: telephoto 85mm feel, shallow depth (f/2.0), low-angle hero composition
cinematography.framing: centered, head near inner rim of the halo
cinematography.exposure: crisp highlights on fire, deep blacks preserved (no lifted shadows)
cinematography.post: high-contrast, slight glow bloom on highlights, tiny chromatic aberration on hottest edges

audio.music: droning dark-ambient pad that rises subtly by +2 dB at the final pulse

celestialMegastructure.description: Epic celestial megastructure with orbital ring

shot.camera_motion: slow ascending crane shot rising from ground level of the city toward the massive glowing ring in the sky
shot.loop_hint: hold final frames of glowing ring and drifting clouds for seamless autoplay loop

subject.hero_element: colossal golden-lit megastructure ring hovering in the sky, half-shrouded in glowing clouds
subject.secondary_elements: grand white stone city with domes, spires, and gardens below
subject.focus: city foreground leading eye upward into the radiant sky portal

scene.environment: mythic celestial metropolis with gleaming architecture, manicured green gardens, and radiant skies
scene.hero_prop: orbital ring structure with glowing circuits and radiant energy
scene.time_of_day: bright mythic afternoon transitioning into heavenly glow

cinematography.framing: low-to-high crane shot emphasizing vertical scale
cinematography.exposure: balanced to preserve detail in highlights of glowing ring and shadows of city
cinematography.post: epic cinematic HDR, golden-and-blue high contrast, volumetric god rays

fx: subtle choral shimmer as ring ignites
audio.music: epic orchestral build with ethereal choir pads

wildlifeCinematography.description: Black and white wildlife cinematography with leopard

shot.camera_motion: slow push-in from low angle toward leopard's piercing gaze

subject.primary: a leopard reclining on a dark mound, tail draped forward, luminous eyes fixed directly on camera
subject.secondary: tall grass strands silhouetted against the darkness
subject.tertiary: texture of spotted fur shimmering in selective light

scene.weather: clear, cool air with faint breeze

cinematography.framing: leopard centered low, with long tail leading diagonally across frame; head and eyes near golden ratio point
cinematography.depth_of_field: shallow, isolating leopard from void background
cinematography.exposure: protect highlights in fur while preserving shadow depth
cinematography.grading: high-contrast monochrome; silver highlights, inky blacks

fx: low ambient night crickets, sparse rustling grass
soft breath of leopard, subtle rumble of chest purr-growl
audio.music: tense, minimal drone with deep cello undertones fading in slowly
audio.mix_notes: diegetic animal and ambient sounds dominate; music subliminal

oceanAstrophotography.description: Ocean wave cinematography with Milky Way background

shot.camera_motion: slow dolly-in at water level toward a towering curling wave
shot.look: cinematic night ocean with astrophotography-grade sky

subject.primary: a giant midnight ocean wave curling like a claw, backlit by starlight
subject.secondary: Milky Way band arcing across the sky; distant jagged coast in silhouette
subject.tertiary: silver moon-glint ripples and sparse bioluminescent flecks in the foam

cinematography.framing: waterline perspective rising slightly as the wave grows; horizon low-right, wave fills left frame, galaxy diagonal top-right
cinematography.depth_of_field: deep focus (hyperfocal) to keep stars and wave crisp
cinematography.exposure: ETTR with protected highlights in foam; specular star glints preserved
cinematography.grading: cool indigo-cyan sea, warm orange galactic core; metallic silver moon reflections

fx: low ocean rumble and distant surf
close, airy spray whoosh as the camera nears the tube
audio.music: sub-bass ambient drone with slow swelling pads; no melody, just rising awe
audio.mix_notes: diegetic water dominates; music -12 LUFS bed, cresting to -9 LUFS at beat 3

perfumeCommercial.description: Perfume commercial with water droplet formation

shot.composition: starts in extreme close-up of rippling water surface, transitions to droplets rising mid-air in formation, ends in centered macro on suspended perfume bottle
shot.lens: macro lens for droplet texture, 50mm for mid-air formation, 85mm for product reveal
shot.camera_movement: cut 1: slow vertical pan up from water surface (2s), cut 2: orbital motion around forming droplet silhouette (3s), cut 3: slow dolly-in as bottle crystallizes mid-air (3s)

subject.description: water droplets rise from a liquid surface and form the suspended shape of a Chanel N°5 perfume bottle mid-air
subject.props: final Chanel N°5 bottle suspended in space, formed from clear and shimmering droplets

scene.location: glossy black reflective platform with infinite dark background
scene.environment: weightless, pure atmosphere with soft ambient mist and faint reflections

visual_details.action: droplets lift and spiral upward with balletic precision, converging mid-air into the iconic geometric silhouette of the Chanel N°5 bottle; the form crystallizes with a shimmer, label appearing last in suspended elegance
visual_details.special_effects: high-detail droplet simulation, slow-motion swirl, material morph from fluid to glass, suspended crystal shimmer

cinematography.lighting: directional spotlight from above with soft side fill, delicate reflections along droplet edges and bottle facets
cinematography.color_palette: black, silver, transparent highlights, champagne gold accent

audio.music: minimal ambient piano with subtle orchestral undertone
audio.sound_effects: droplet rise chimes, soft formation resonance, crystalline ping as final form completes
audio.mix_level: elegant, delicate, focused on sonic purity and clarity
